publ: by University of the West Indies, Cave Hill
name: ChoiceFinder
0:
”Alexa open choice ladder”
”Alexa ask choice ladder to recommend a flavor”
”Alexa tell choice ladder restart”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: choice ladder
des:
Ask Choice Ladder for help choosing an ice cream flavor based on choices.

Alexa will provide an ideal ice cream flavor by asking a series of questions and giving you an answer.

To start, just say "Open, Choice Ladder" or "Alexa, open Choice Ladder" to begin.

At any time, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop" or you can exit by saying "Bye"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
